entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
